constraint.name: ca_codigos_postales_users_last_nick
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (last_nick) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_codigos_postales_users_nick
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (nick) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_codigos_postales_paises
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codpais) REFERENCES paises (codpais) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_codigos_postales_provincias
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idprovincia) REFERENCES provincias (idprovincia) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_codigos_postales_ciudades
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idciudad) REFERENCES ciudades (idciudad) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
